name: Analysis of the mutant picornavirus RNA-dependent RNA polymerase with disrupted primary and secondary RNA structure (RdRPΔrna)-dependent transcriptome in human THP-1 monocytic leukemia cells
description: lentiviral vector containing a mutant picornavirus RNA-dependent RNA polymerase with disrupted primary and secondary RNA structure (RdRPΔrna) or empty vector. RdRPΔrna contains pervasive, coding-neutral point mutations in the RdRP cDNA to maximally disrupt primary and secondary RNA structure.
